description:
Kira and Cagalli go to the city of Banadiya, where the ZAFT base is located, to buy food and supplies for the camp. The two accidently meet the “Desert Tiger” Andrew Waltfeld when they are eating lunch and are baffled over his overly friendly manner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-19 - Dans les griffes de l`ennemi
